sent_inference: I enjoy going sailing with my father.
I don't like eating out at upscale places.
Some of the cookies were chocolate.
The movie was funny or sad.

John goes to the bakery every day.
Bob doesn't usually pay attention to the weather.

Bob does not care that much about his students and doesn't get to know them.
